players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Bob: "I find it strange that Diana was found dead so suddenly. Let's be vigilant and make sure we don't let the mafia slip through our fingers."
Bob: "I'm concerned about the sudden death of Diana. Let's all keep a close eye on each other and make sure we don't let any suspicious activity go unnoticed."
